titleStmt.title: A faithful rebuke to a false report lately dispersed in a letter to a friend in the country Concerning certain differences in doctrinals, between some dissenting ministers in London.
titleStmt.author: Alsop, Vincent, 1629 or 30-1703.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Lawrence, at the angel in the Poultrey,

notesStmt.note: Final leaf bears errata and advertisement.
A reply to: Williams, Daniel. Gospel truth stated and vindicated .., and to Lobb, Stephen. A report of the state of the differences ..
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
